Package com.enjin.sdk.models.request

Class BaseRequest<T extends BaseRequest<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enjin.sdk.graphql.GraphQLRequest<T>
      • com.enjin.sdk.models.request.BaseRequest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the request.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphQLVariableHolder<T>, TransactionFragment<T>, TokenEventFragment<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateRequest, UpdateRequest
    public class BaseRequest<T extends BaseRequest<T>>
extends GraphQLRequest<T>
implements TransactionFragment<T>
    An object class for creating a new request on the Trusted platform.
    See Also:
    RequestsService
